goal.ch:
1. 衛星資料處理
2. 衛星資料分析
3. 衛星資料應用

outline.ch:
1. 實際觀測資料下載
2. 電腦程式編寫
3. 電腦化資料處理

textbook.ch:
1. Holton, J.R., An introduction to dynamic meteorology, 3rd edition, Academic Press, 1992.
2. Haltiner, G.J., and Williams, R.T., Numerical prediction and dynamic meteorology, 2nd edition, John Wiley and Sons, 1980.
3. Lots of online open-source books on python, fortran, etc.
textbook.en:
1. Holton, J.R., An introduction to dynamic meteorology, 3rd edition, Academic Press, 1992.
2. Haltiner, G.J., and Williams, R.T., Numerical prediction and dynamic meteorology, 2nd edition, John Wiley and Sons, 1980.
3. Lots of online open-source books on python, fortran, etc.

flexDiscription.en: 2 weeks of individual studies by students

ch.competencies: 國際視野與語文溝通能力
專業倫理及服務學習之能力

en.competencies: Ability in basic mathematics and science
Ability in international horizons and communication
Ability in professional ethics and  community service and learning
